author: Lee_Fogel
title: Simple but lots of value!
review:
This set was a freebie at Toys R Us. While it has no minifigure the lance and sword are pretty nifty. And the set, while simple, has a nice astetic appeal. And there is enough room to have three minifigure knights standing in front of the shield dock. 

The real value though is with the white shield and the shields on the back of each character card. If you play the app game these are very useful to you. 

Lego sets always have extra parts and this set had two which were the blue handle piece at the top (behind the shield) and a grey base piece.

Note that the instructions were a separate sheet that was not folded up in the bag but was separate. One can find the instructions online on Flickr and other picture servers.

Overall this is a small but useful set. The addition of the shields for the characters in the app game make this a terrific value!

http://www.thebrickfan.com/lego-nexo-knights-shield-dock-building-instructions/
